title: Prosper Where You're Planted | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Prosper Where You're Planted | Joel Osteen
description:
Sometimes God won't bring you out of the trouble because He wants to bless you in the midst of it. You don't have to wait to get out of the trial to see His supernatural favor. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
